p.k: After Rigby causes the guys to get locked in a meat locker, he must get help from some hot dogs in order to get them out. / Mordecai and Rigby try and prank the Master Prank Caller to be the best prank callers. The MPC sends them back to 1982. / Mordecai and Rigby lie about being astronauts in order to cut in line at a restaurant. / After lying about having an awesome band, Mordecai and Rigby must get help from their future selves in order to learn how to play in time for the battle of the bands. / After watching a scary movie about a British Taxi the guys have to help Rigby overcome his fears.
